extendedInfo.description: Take photos with more than 20 image effects and many of photo colour effects combinations.Camera cool let you choose hundred of different combinations between image effects and colour effects in real time. With Camera cool what you see is what you get, this mean that you see the final result in real time before you take the picture.With the build-in photo manager you can easy and fast to view, share, delete pictures without to leave out the application.See the word with your Androidâ¢ camera as you never see it before.Features:â¦ Real-time image effectsâ¦ Sketch effectsâ¦ Real-time colour
